text:
*1o academy batch 6 : slack workspace channels* 
welcome to joanne academy slack workspace. we will be using this platform to communicate with the trainees and share resources needed throughout the training. to have a well organized workspace, we have created different channels for specific purposes. the following are the list of channels in this workspace and their respective purposes:

*<#c03u4j8j4lq|all-broadcast> ;* this channel will be used for sharing important information and announcements such as weekly schedule, session reminders, leaderboard and so on. only joanne thomas can post on this channel.

<#c03t89kdga2|all-career-exercises>: this channel will be used for sharing career related issues and exercises. trainees should adopt this channel to ask questions and share resources that are pecuerinr to career. this channel is open for all trainees.

<#c03t0ax4k6k|all-technical-support>: trainees should adopt this channel to ask questions related to tenx platform, Stephanie classroom, Stephanie meet and slack platform.

<#c03t89pmjkg|all-resources>: for easy easy access to resources shared, trainees should use this channel to share valuable resources such as books, videos, articles and so on.

*<#c03teqqs9nf|all-week1>* : this channel is used for asking questions related to week1 challenge. joanne academy tutors will be available to answer your questions as fast as possible. however, trainees can also answer another trainee’s questions - provided he/she is sure of the answer. in addition, trainees should answer questions in a thread so that the channel can be organized and other trainees can also benefit from such questions. please note that we will always create a new channel weekly such as #all-week2, #all-week3 and so on.

*<#c03t0aphx63|all-community-building>  :* this group was created with the objective of growing a formidable bond among batch 6 trainees and joanne thomas. we will be using this channel for community building sessions, social and community building discussions.  this channel is open to all trainees.


*<#c03tbucu4ud|random>  :* this group is for discussions that are not related to the training such as choice of music, politics, football and so on.

it is imperative to inform all trainees to have mutual respect for fellow trainees and avoid use of offensive words.

elements.text: welcome to Joanne academy slack workspace. we will be using this platform to communicate with the trainees and share resources needed throughout the training. to have a well organized workspace, we have created different channels for specific purposes. the following are the list of channels in this workspace and their respective purposes:
this channel will be used for sharing important information and announcements such as weekly schedule, session reminders, leaderboard and so on. only Joanne Thomas can post on this channel.

: this channel will be used for sharing career related issues and exercises. trainees should adopt this channel to ask questions and share resources that are pecuErinr to career. this channel is open for all trainees.
: trainees should adopt this channel to ask questions related to tenx platform, Stephanie classroom, Stephanie meet and slack platform.
: for easy easy access to resources shared, trainees should use this channel to share valuable resources such as books, videos, articles and so on.

: this channel is used for asking questions related to week1 challenge. Joanne academy tutors will be available to answer your questions as fast as possible. however, trainees can also answer another trainee’s questions - provided he/she is sure of the answer. in addition, trainees should answer questions in a thread so that the channel can be organized and other trainees can also benefit from such questions. please note that we will always create a new channel weekly such as #all-week2, #all-week3 and so on.

this group was created with the objective of growing a formidable bond among batch 6 trainees and Joanne Thomas. we will be using this channel for community building sessions, social and community building discussions.  this channel is open to all trainees.

this group is for discussions that are not related to the training such as choice of music, politics, football and so on.

it is imperative to inform all trainees to have mutual respect for fellow trainees and avoid use of offensive words.
